name: 章韶洵
objective: This course "Introduction to Music" is intend to give an introductory survey on Western classical music. We will listen to and explore some important musical pieces of different periods from the medieval to the modern. Other topics include Chinese music and world music. Through this course, students will become familiar with the musical language and hopefully gain a lifelong interest in music as an art form.
schedule:
week 1 Mid-autumn Festival
week 2 Introduction 
week 3 Music - an Art of Time 
week 4 Chamber Music 
week 5 Orchestral Music 
week 6 Nationalism 
week 7 Twentieth Century Music
week 8 Chinese Music
week 9 Midterm Exam
week 10 Musical-1
week 11 Musical-2
week 12 Opera
week 13 Visiting National Concert Hall
week 14 Concert
week 15 Christmas Music
week 16 Presentation 1
week 17 Presentation 2
week 18 Final exam week
scorePolicy:
Midterm exam 20%
Final presentation 30%
Students are expected to attend a live concert of classical music and write a report 20%
Attendance and class participation 30%
materials: Kristine Forney: The Enjoyment of Music
